messages.message:
I tried multi-doc converse on aihub-uat.internal.instabase.com (http://aihub-uat.internal.instabase.com) and overall the experience felt intuitive to "change scope" etc. I have a question and some feedback.
Question: Any guidance on what "should be" possible? Can I ask it "verify that the amount on Doc 1 matches an entry on Doc 2"
Feedback: When I asked it to describe each document, it referred to them as "Document 0", "Document 1" and "Document 2". Can we have it return the file names instead.
The Multistep model has access to the file names. @Atinder is adding it to the Advanced model too
